code:
State machine: simple_fsm
States: A, B, C, D
Transitions:
  - walk: A → B
  - run: B → C
  - sprint: C → D
Initial state: A
dot:
---
simple_fsm
---
stateDiagram-v2
  direction LR
  classDef s_default fill:white,color:black
  classDef s_inactive fill:white,color:black
  classDef s_parallel color:black,fill:white
  classDef s_active color:red,fill:darksalmon
  classDef s_previous color:blue,fill:azure
  
  state "A" as A
  Class A s_active
  state "B" as B
  Class B s_default
  state "C" as C
  Class C s_default
  state "D" as D
  Class D s_default
  
  A --> B: walk
  B --> C: run
  C --> D: sprint
  [*] --> A

code:
State machine: conditional_fsm
States: A, B, C
Transitions:
  - go: A → B [condition: ['is_ready']]
  - go: A → C
  - back: B → A
  - back: C → A
Initial state: A
dot:
---
conditional_fsm
---
stateDiagram-v2
  direction LR
  classDef s_default fill:white,color:black
  classDef s_inactive fill:white,color:black
  classDef s_parallel color:black,fill:white
  classDef s_active color:red,fill:darksalmon
  classDef s_previous color:blue,fill:azure
  
  state "A" as A
  Class A s_active
  state "B" as B
  Class B s_default
  state "C" as C
  Class C s_default
  
  A --> B: go
  A --> C: go
  B --> A: back
  C --> A: back
  [*] --> A

code:
State machine: traffic_light
States: green, yellow, red
Transitions:
  - slow_down: green → yellow
  - stop: yellow → red
  - go: red → green
Initial state: green
dot:
---
traffic_light
---
stateDiagram-v2
  direction LR
  classDef s_default fill:white,color:black
  classDef s_inactive fill:white,color:black
  classDef s_parallel color:black,fill:white
  classDef s_active color:red,fill:darksalmon
  classDef s_previous color:blue,fill:azure
  
  state "green" as green
  Class green s_active
  state "yellow" as yellow
  Class yellow s_default
  state "red" as red
  Class red s_default
  
  green --> yellow: slow_down
  yellow --> red: stop
  red --> green: go
  [*] --> green

code:
State machine: door_controller
States: closed, opening, open, closing
Transitions:
  - open_button: closed → opening
  - opened: opening → open
  - close_button: open → closing
  - closed_complete: closing → closed
Initial state: closed
dot:
---
door_controller
---
stateDiagram-v2
  direction LR
  classDef s_default fill:white,color:black
  classDef s_inactive fill:white,color:black
  classDef s_parallel color:black,fill:white
  classDef s_active color:red,fill:darksalmon
  classDef s_previous color:blue,fill:azure
  
  state "closed" as closed
  Class closed s_active
  state "opening" as opening
  Class opening s_default
  state "open" as open
  Class open s_default
  state "closing" as closing
  Class closing s_default
  
  closed --> opening: open_button
  opening --> open: opened
  open --> closing: close_button
  closing --> closed: closed_complete
  [*] --> closed
